channel.title: How do you change how you hold & attack with a weapon?
channel.description: Like, in my server, you attack with a Dragon 2h Sword like you would if you used the Dragon Axe's special attack. It's annoying & I wanted to fix it. Can someone tell me? BTW, that's not the only item I want to change the attack emote for. I also want to fix the Greataxe's attack emote

item.title: How do you change how you hold & attack with a weapon?

item.source: How do you change how you hold & attack with a weapon?

item.title: How do you change how you hold & attack with a weapon?
item.dc:creator: @Duhsmersh Duhsmersh
item.description:
@Duhsmersh wrote:

[quote=“Greek Line, post:2, topic:74455”][ul]Hmm :|…

Maybe it must a Emote Switch or something I guess. Most people who make things like special attack come off of a Emote such as:
[list]
[li]When you make your player clap with a weapon in his hand[/li][/list]
He would make the weapon move left and right each time he’d swing his arm back & forward.
[list][li]When you make your play spin with a weapon in his hand[/li][/list]
He would probably hit the monster 2 times in 1 whole turn.[/ul][/quote]

What?

Read full topic
